summary:
This is a small overhaul mod which changes, buffs, and adds to the six skills of the warrior (Smithing, Heavy Armor, Blocking, Two-Handed, One-Handed, and Archery).
This is part of a complete perk overhaul I have planned.
descriptionHtml:
Perk PAC - Combat is a perk overhaul for the six skills of the warrior in Skyrim (Smithing, Heavy Armor, Block, Two-Handed, One-Handed, Archery). 

The mod strives to expand on the existing system, allowing for more freedom and customisation while remaining true to the original model. 

Changes: 
-All perk constellations now fit to the constellation outline, rather than being strewn about in a general shape. 
-All \'primary\' perks (Overdraw, Barbarian etc.) are now split into five different perks (Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert and Master) 
-All \'primary\' perks now stack (each level of Overdraw increases only 15%, but the 15% increases stack to a total of just over a 100% increase). 
-Master perks are now Level 100 perks, and come with an extra effect. 

A list of all Perk changes is coming shortly, along with a new mod for the thief\'s skills. If there are any problems, issues, or suggestions feel free to leave me a comment.
author: Pacmasian
